title: The court convert: or, A sincere sorrow for sin, faithfully travers'd expressing the dignity of a true penitent. Drawn in little by one, whose manifold misfortunes abroad, have render'd him necessitated, to seek for shelter here; by dedicating himself and this small poem. By H.A. gent.
author: H. W. (Henry Waring)
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Copy stained with print show-through and tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
